Source.Name: zdelta
Source.Summary: zdelta is a general purpose delta compression library.
Source.Description: zdelta is a general purpose delta compression library. It is implemented by modifying zlib source code . The modifications are marked in all original zlib source files. All the code is thread safe. The data format used by the libzd library is identical to zlib one.
